com.mlt.task.file

Class FileCopy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.task.Task
      • com.mlt.task.file.FileCopy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>

    public class FileCopy
extends Task
    Utility class to copy files from a list of source directories to a list of destination directories.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
